alfredsnippet.snippet:
"It is an axiom of science that no theory will remain valid forever. That being so, the 'current paradigm' is by definition invalid! 'Defense of the paradigm' is therefore indefensible. Each new datum should be cause for a review, not just of the current paradigm, but of every choice that led up to it."

- Don L. Hotson
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Each New Datum Should Be Cause for a Review
